name: D6 Knight
description:
RNGesus gave you the power to control your dice rolls, but if you use this power excessively, they will kill you. Defeat your enemies using this divine power!

Rules:

Each turn you have to choose where to move and the power of your attack. The higher the numbers you choose, the faster the scale on the right side of the screen fills up. If enemies kill you or the scale fills up before you kill all of them, you lose. Otherwise, you win.
